mapper.select: select e.id eid, e.name ename, u.name uname, phonenum, e.status estatus from scfp_enterprise e left join scfp_user u on e.id = u.enterprise_id left join scfp_supply s on e.id = s.supply_id where e.role = 2 and u.role_id = 1 and s.fid is null

select s.supply_id eid, e.name ename, u.name uname, phonenum, e.status estatus from scfp_supply s left join scfp_enterprise e on e.id = s.supply_id left join scfp_user u on s.supply_id = u.enterprise_id where s.fid = #{eid}

select e.id eid, e.name ename, u.name uname, phonenum, e.status estatus from scfp_enterprise e left join scfp_user u on e.id = u.enterprise_id left join scfp_supply s on e.id = s.supply_id where e.id=#{roleId} and u.role_id = 1
